title: Proposed Schema for the DDoS Info Sharing Project, for the output of the data distribution service.

SourceName.description: The name of the organization of the user requesting data.

outputData.description: A list of one or more objects describing attacks from individial IP addresses.

outputDataItem.description: An object with information about a DDoS attack from a single IP address.

IPaddress.description: The IP address that was the source of the DDoS attack packets.

lastTimeReceived.description: RFC 3339 formatted timestamp, indicating the last time CRITs received information about this IP address.

numberOfTimesSeen.description: The number of times that the IP address has been reported to CRITs by one or more ISPs.

numberOfReporters.description: The number of ISPs who have reported this IP address.

reportedBy.description: A list of ISPs who have reported this IP address and have chosen to disclose that they reported this IP.

City.description: The city associated with the IP Address based on geo IP info.

State.description: The state associated with the IP Address based on geo IP info.

Country.description: The country associated with the IP Address based on geo IP info, formatted as an ISO alpha-2 code.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the IP address based on geo IP info.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the IP address based on geo IP info.

totalBytesSent.description: The total number of bytes sent by this IP address among all events.

totalPacketsSent.description: The total number of packets sent by this IP address among all events.

events.description: A list of attack events that originated from this IP address.

attackStartTime.description: RFC 3339 formatted timestamp, indicating when this attack event started.

attackStopTime.description: RFC 3339 formatted timestamp, indicating when this attack event ended.

timeRecorded.description: RFC 3339 formatted timestamp, indicating the time CRITs received information for this event.

attackTypes.description: The type(s) of attack(s) at the time of this event.

totalBytesSent.description: The total number of bytes that came during this event.

totalPacketsSent.description: The total number of packets that came during this event.

peakBPS.description: The maximum rate of bytes that came during this event, measured in bytes per second.

peakPPS.description: The maximum rate of packets that came during this event, measured in packets per second.

sourcePort.description: The source port used for the attack.

destinationPort.description: The destination port used for the attack.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the attack.
